channel.title: Another R blog
channel.description: Because we need more R blogs

item.title: Introducing eemR
item.description: EEM (excitation-emission fluorescence matrix) The eemR package implements various functions used calculate metrics from excitation-emission matrix (EEM) as well as to preform pre-processing corrections before PARAFAC analysis. All functions from this package start with the eem_ prefix. Please note this is a very alpha version of the package for testing...
